英文法規名稱: Fee Standards for Biological Products, Centers for Disease Control, Ministry of Health and Welfare
中文法規名稱: 衛生福利部疾病管制署生物製劑收費標準
沿革內容:
1. Formulated and announced in 5 articles on April 29, 2009, by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, under Shu-Shou-Chi Order No. 0980000318
2. Amended the title (original title: Fee Standards for Biological Products, Centers for Disease Control, Department of Health, the Executive Yuan) and Articles 2 and 5 and the Attachment to Article 4 and announced by the Ministry of Health and Welfare on December 31, 2013 under Bu-Shou-Chi Order No. 1020103933; with the exception of the Attachment to Articles 4, which shall enter into force on January 1, 2014, the Fee Standards shall enter into force beginning the date of promulgation.

法規內容.條文內容: This set of Standards is formulated in accordance with regulations of Article 10 of the Service Fees Act.
This set of Standards applies to the biological products manufactured and supplied by the Centers for Disease Control, Ministry of Health and Welfare.

The kinds of biological products mentioned in this set of Standards are as follows:
1. Toxoids
2. Antivenins
3. BCG vaccines
Items and fees charged for the biological products manufactured and supplied are as Attachment.

This set of Standards, with the exception of the Attachment to Articles 4 which was amended on December 31, 2013 and shall enter into force on January 1, 2014, shall enter into force beginning the date of promulgation.
